channel.title: [Crash] Surface Tension Cliffs Sequence
channel.description: Fighting the Apache helicopter right after getting the rocket launcher. Amazingly the turrets didn't crash the game this time, getting pelted to death with bullets in a very short time might be the actual cause. It's like the game auto rage-quits for us XP minidumpbm2012_3.zip (24 KB)

item.title: [Crash] Surface Tension Cliffs Sequence
item.dc:creator: SPBHM
item.description:
I think my game crashed on the same place, I took a rocket launcher and started firing at the helicopter and than the game crashed…
